attributes.action: MPs claiming all but the most reasonable expenses should be sacked
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The disclosure about some Mps, expenses, demonstrates a true money grabbing character.

You can’t be ‘honourable’ and exploit the system just because the rules allow. This demonstrates a dubious nature that should preclude such a person holding the job. The connotation is such a person is likely to exercise privilege for their own personal gain in other aspects.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
